# Setup

We will be using the `statsmodel` package and `diabetes` dataset for this problem set.

import pandas as pd

#set options to always display all columns in DataFrame

# load diabetes data

namedict = {'s1': 'totchol', 's2':'ldl', 's3':'hdl', 's4':'tch',
